thread.title: J C Miami
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da J C Miami

author: J C Miami
title: J C Miami
text: my order was placed and paid for in early September. After not receiving my order by october I wrote to costumer service ( they did not contact me) until my inquiry as to where my order was... they responded it would be shipped by november. This happened ( I inquiring- they responding with a later and later date) month after month... until I just recieved my order... 5 months later. unexceptable. Customer service was always polite but five months is ridiculous especially once you charged my crdit card.
